channel.title: docker on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Terminal

item.title: Mac启动k8s
item.description: 参考链接 https://juejin.im/post/5d87980f5188253f74438bb6 启动 docker mac desktop 已经自带 k8s，设置成启动就可。 web 查看dashboard https://github.com/kubernetes/dashboard # 查看 token 用于登录 kubectl -n kube-system describe secret default| awk '$1=="token:"{print $2}'
